== Introduction ==
VoiceOne is a complete Linux distribution based on Ubuntu 10.04 that gives you the ability to install a pbx platform with an easy to use web based GUI, which would be a framework to build a communication server adding various plugins.

== Contact Information ==
web site: http://www.voiceone.it email: info@callware.it phone: +39 0456305891

== Audience ==
We turn to those who want to install a robust enviroment to build a communication server based on Asterisk PBX.

== Mainly Features ==

*** Asterisk 1.8 in realtime configuration with MySQL
*** PHP 5.3
*** Ubuntu 10.04
*** Supports both Hard disk and Compact Flash Card installation
*** Interface to manage updates
*** Backup/Restore
*** Call recording through a Web interface
*** Voicemail web panel
*** Dynamic IVR
*** Snom Phones provisioner
*** Support for call queues
*** Two levels of SSH access with interactive menu for the main operations
*** OpenVPN server to provide both secure remote help and remote extensions
*** DHCP server for autoprovisioning
*** TFTP server for autoprovisioning
*** SIP anti intrusion system to prevent SIP attacks
